h1: How to take a photo of your fit note

list.li1: You can use a smartphone, camera or tablet. Or you can use a scanner connected to a computer.
list.li2: You must hold your smartphone, tablet or camera in landscape mode (sideways) when taking the photo. The fit note must also be landscape.
list.li3: The whole fit note must be shown. It needs to be on 1 page.
list.li4: Check that the image is in focus and all the text can be read.
